hero.title: DESIGN AND ARCHITECTURE STUDIO
hero.description: We create architecture and interiors that inspire and make life more comfortable

creativePath.title: Creative Journey
creativePath.name: Dmitry Arkadyevich Kefkhayants
creativePath.description1: I was born in 1988 in Tashkent. In 2005, I graduated from school and enrolled in TASI in the Faculty of Architectural Environment Design. I graduated from the institute in 2009 with one of the highest scores.
creativePath.description2: In 2008, I won first place at the International Architectural Competition MACCA - 1st place (diploma), Minsk, Belarus.
creativePath.description3: In August 2009, I won 1st place at the Uzbekistan Architects Guild competition (diploma), Tashkent.
creativePath.description4: In January 2010, I became a laureate of the 'Forum Fund' award and won 1st place at the 'Navkiron Uzbekistan' Festival of Traditional and Modern Art (diploma), Tashkent, Uzbekistan.
creativePath.description5: I received my first job and project in 2009 at the age of 21. Since then, I have been dedicated solely to architecture and design, working with various major companies.
creativePath.description6: November 2009 - September 2010: Joint Venture LLC 'Neftegazsanoatloyikha', Tashkent, Uzbekistan. Position – Designer.
creativePath.description7: March 2012 - August 2013: LLC 'TRDM', 'Federation Tower Moscow, City', Moscow, Russia. Position – Architect-Designer.
creativePath.description8: March 2014 - September 2014: Joint Venture LLC 'GLOBAL', Almaty, Kazakhstan. Position – Architect.
creativePath.description9: January 2015 - March 2017: LLC 'UzkoprikLoyikha', Tashkent, Uzbekistan. Position – Chief Project Engineer.
creativePath.description10: June 2017 - September 2019: Architectural company LLC 'Niiat', Tashkent, Uzbekistan. Position – Chief Architect.
creativePath.description11: 2019 - 2021: LLC 'Epsilon Development Company', Tashkent/Karshi region. Position – Head of Architectural-Construction Group / Chief Project Engineer.
creativePath.description12: 2022: 'Enter Engineering' company, Head of Civil Construction and VZiSOV.
creativePath.description13: 2023 - present: Chief Architect at LLC 'Niiat', Tashkent, Uzbekistan. In 2023, I founded my own architecture and design studio 'MARS architects', which is actively developing in all directions.

projects.title: Architectural Projects
projects.description: We create architecture that harmoniously combines aesthetics, functionality, and innovative technologies. Our studio’s portfolio includes unique residential, commercial, and public space projects designed with modern trends and our clients’ individual needs in mind.

items.name: Modern Residential Complex
items.short_description: A modern residential complex with sustainable design.
items.description:
This project incorporates innovative architectural solutions.
It prioritizes eco-friendly materials and energy efficiency.

items.name: Commercial Hub
items.short_description: A dynamic commercial space for businesses.
items.description:
Designed for functionality and aesthetics.
Includes modern technologies for smart operations.

items.title: Innovative Architectural Trends
items.description: An article exploring the latest trends in sustainable architecture.

items.title: Design of the Future
items.description: An article about our studio’s approach to modern design.

design.title: Interior Design
design.description: We create interiors that reflect our clients’ style, character, and lifestyle. In our work, we combine aesthetics, functionality, and modern technologies to make each project unique and comfortable.

items.name: Luxury Apartment
items.description:
Exquisite interior design for a modern apartment.
Uses high-quality materials and smart home technologies.

items.name: Cozy Villa
items.description:
A warm and inviting villa interior.
Designed for comfort and elegance.

contacts.title: Contact Us
contacts.description: Have questions? Want to learn more about our services? Write to us using the form below, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
